identity.name: Nexodify AVA Label Compliance Preflight
identity.vibe: Swiss Precision meets Enterprise Trust. High contrast, data-dense, document-centric.
principles: Fusion: Bloomberg Terminal data density x Aesop minimalism
Content is King: The Compliance Report is the hero
Zoom In: Micro-interactions on data points
Negative Space: Generous padding around the 'paper' document container

rules: Headings (H1-H3) must use Outfit. Weight: 600 or 700.
Body text must use Geist. Weight: 400 for text, 500 for labels.
Letter spacing: tracking-tight for all headings > 24px.
Line height: leading-none for headings, leading-relaxed for body.

primary.description: Stark Black/White for primary actions. No generic blue buttons.

accent.description: Electric Indigo for active states, links, and focus rings.

rules: Sidebar: Fixed width (240px), dark mode by default even in light theme for contrast.
Main Content: 'Paper' metaphor. White card on light gray background.
Widgets: Sharp corners (rounded-sm), 1px border, no shadow (flat).
Split screen for Auth: 50% Form (Clean), 50% Art (Abstract Tech).
Use 'Tracing Beam' borders on input fields for focus state.

inputs.classes: h-10 rounded-sm border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

wizard.stepper: Horizontal line with numbered nodes. Active node glows.

results_card.structure: Header (Status Icon + Title + Score) | Body (Details Accordion) | Footer (Actions)

auth_background.usage: Cover image for the right side of Login/Register pages.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'index.css' with the CSS variables provided in 'colors.overrides'.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main area.
4. AUTH: Build Login/Register pages using the 'Split Screen' pattern with the provided auth_background image.
5. WIZARD: Implement the 4-step wizard using a state machine or simple step state. Ensure data persists between steps.
6. RESULTS: Create a robust 'ComplianceCard' component that handles Pass/Fail/Warning states visually.
7. MOCK DATA: Since backend is external, create a 'mockData.js' file to simulate API responses for the dashboard and results.
8. TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT center text in the dashboard. Left align everything for readability.
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for validation.
Keep the UI 'dry' and 'crisp'. No unnecessary decorations.
